subject: Sun One + jUnit
msgSnippet: hi all! please reply to  static.x@voila.fr
messageBody:
hi all!

please reply to >>> static.x@... <<<

I need to write automated tests, that's why i've chosen jUnit.
But, without using the jUnit package, just by using the Netbeans
JUnit Module (junit.nbm) with Sun One, I can generate the tests
squeleton.

my question is: what is the use of jUnit package then ??
What can jUnit package bring to me ?
